snippet.title: Tactical Squad: SWAT Stories – Sneak Preview
snippet.description:
Big news for Tactical Squad: SWAT Stories – we're preparing a demo for the game in collaboration with Red Mountain Games!
https://www.facebook.com/RedMountainGame/
https://twitter.com/redmountaingame

So here's a short preview of what's to come – the player issuing commands to their unit in an effort to breach a room full of armed suspects.

We've also started a Discord server for the game! https://discord.gg/DQepwC6CcN
Join our budding community and share your thoughts and ideas for Tactical Squad.

Add the game to your wishlist on Steam and follow it for future updates and to support our project – https://store.steampowered.com/app/1619310/Tactical_Squad__SWAT_Stories/
